name.description: Specifies the name of the EventHub Namespace resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the namespace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku.description: Defines which tier to use. Valid options are `Basic` and `Standard`.

capacity.description: Specifies the Capacity / Throughput Units for a `Standard` SKU namespace. Valid values range from `1` - `20`.

auto_inflate_enabled.description: Is Auto Inflate enabled for the EventHub Namespace?

maximum_throughput_units.description: Specifies the maximum number of throughput units when Auto Inflate is Enabled. Valid values range from `1` - `20`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

default_action.description: The default action to take when a rule is not matched. Possible values are `Allow` and `Deny`.

virtual_network_rule.description: One or more `virtual_network_rule` blocks as defined below.

ip_rule.description: One or more `ip_rule` blocks as defined below.

subnet_id.description: The id of the subnet to match on.

ignore_missing_virtual_network_service_e.description: Are missing virtual network service endpoints ignored? Defaults to `false`.

ip_mask.description: The ip mask to match on.

action.description: The action to take when the rule is  matched. Possible values are `Allow`.

default_primary_connection_string.description: The primary connection string for the authorization

default_secondary_connection_string.description: The secondary connection string for the

default_primary_key.description: The primary access key for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

default_secondary_key.description: The secondary access key for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

create.description: Used when creating the EventHub Namespace.

update.description: Used when updating the EventHub Namespace.

read.description: Used when retrieving the EventHub Namespace.

delete.description: Used when deleting the EventHub Namespace.
